name: Tupan
description: The Tupan currency was created to solve, simply and assertively, the necessary transition to a regenerative and circular economy focused on COÂ² certificate. By uniting the high technology of cryptocurrencies and the blockchain network, with the greatest demands of the century, Tupan brings you the opportunity to make a difference in the environment, while enjoying an investment with high potential for appreciation. Tupan invests in the only investment fund ForestAu Green, which makes the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the United Nations (UN) possible through investments in the Circular Bioeconomy.
